titles.title: Fair Housing for Domestic Violence and Sexual Assault Survivors Act of 2019
Fair Housing for Domestic Violence and Sexual Assault Survivors Act of 2019
A bill to provide protection for survivors of domestic violence or sexual assault under the Fair Housing Act.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary:
Fair Housing for Domestic Violence and Sexual Assault Survivors Act of 2019
This bill prohibits discrimination against survivors of domestic violence or sexual assault in the sale or rental of housing and other related real estate activities.
